videos.description: Kenny Williams buries a three from the corner to extend UNC's run to 10-0.
videos.headline: Williams extends UNC run to double-digits

videos.description: Kenny Williams picks up a steal and finishes in transition for UNC.
videos.headline: UNC's Williams gets the steal and bucket

videos.description: Kenny Williams nails his third 3-pointer of the first half off a great look from Luke Maye.
videos.headline: Williams knocks down 3-pointer from Maye

videos.description: Jalek Felton knocks down a jumper before the halftime buzzer as UNC puts up 53 points in the first half.
videos.headline: Felton hits jumper to end the half

videos.description: Mike Amius trails the play and gets a block on Garrison Brooks.
videos.headline: Western Carolina's Amius gets huge rejection

videos.description: Garrison Brooks cuts to the basket and finishes with an alley-oop from Jalek Felton.
videos.headline: Brooks gets up for alley-oop
